title: Task-Centered Online Education for Strengthening Academic Literature Review Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational research methodologies and experience in academic literature search
context.additional_context: Practitioners enhancing academic literature review skills in digital environments while balancing work. Learning progresses using diverse devices in a BYOD setting.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically search for research papers relevant to their topics in academic databases.
Learners can evaluate the credibility of selected literature and critically analyze key content.
Learners can systematically apply synthesized literature to address research questions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
